Package: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.tasks

[Java] Class GenerateIvyDescriptor

        • org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.tasks.GenerateIvyDescriptor

        • Generates an Ivy XML Module Descriptor file.

          1.4
